name: openHotPotatoCloser
description: Checks for closed hot potatoes in OpenHotPotato Dynamo table and updates accordingly.

scripts.create-aws-function: aws --profile landrys lambda create-function --function-name openHotPotatoCloserHandler --runtime nodejs6.10 --role arn:aws:iam::419745589400:role/lambda_basic_execution --description 'Checks for closed hot potatoes in OpenHotPotato Dynamo table and updates accordingly.' --handler src/openHotPotatoCloserHandler.openHotPotatoCloserHandler --zip-file fileb://dist/package.zip
scripts.update-aws-function: aws --profile landrys lambda update-function-code --function-name openHotPotatoCloserHandler --zip-file fileb://dist/package.zip

author: Fabio Piergentili
